marketNews.title: Property Sector: 9M25 Marketing Sales Compilation
marketNews.content: Several residential property issuers have announced their marketing sales realizations for 9M25, including Ciputra Development ($CTRA), Summarecon Agung ($SMRA), Alam Sutera Realty ($ASRI), and Pakuwon Jati ($PWON) [see table]. Here are some highlights from us: SMRA recorded the highest marketing sales growth during 9M25 (+34% YoY), resulting in the realization toward the 2025 marketing sales target reaching 71%, which is better than the previous year (vs. 9M24: 61% realization in 2024). We estimate SMRA's marketing sales surge during 9M25 was driven by the launching of new products in Summarecon Serpong in 2Q25. CTRA recorded the highest realization against the 2025 marketing sales target, reaching 76%. For context, in October 2025, CTRA announced a downward revision of its 2025 marketing sales target from IDR 11 trillion to IDR 10 trillion in line with a more prudent outlook (vs. 2024 realization: IDR 11 trillion). The marketing sales realization for ASRI and PWON during 9M25 reached 60% and 50% of their respective 2025 targets, lower than the achievement in 9M24 (ASRI 9M24: 73% realization in 2024, PWON 9M24: 73% realization in 2024). The achievement of 9M25 marketing sales occurred amidst the government-borne value-added tax (PPN DTP) incentive of 100%. Previously, this incentive was scheduled to end in June 2025 and was set to drop to 50% during the July-December 2025 period, but the government announced in July 2025 that the 100% incentive would continue throughout the July-December 2025 period. In October 2025, the Minister of Finance, Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa, stated that the 100% PPN DTP incentive would be extended until 2027. During 9M25, PWON was the issuer with the highest PPN DTP contribution to marketing sales, with 73.3% of total marketing sales originating from products eligible for the incentive. Meanwhile, SMRA has not released data regarding the PPN DTP contribution. Stock prices for ASRI and PWON refer to the left y-axis, while stock prices for SMRA, BSDE, and CTRA refer to the outer right y-axis. The BI Rate (IDBIRRPO Index) refers to the inner right y-axis. Interest rates are displayed with a 40-week lag against stock prices to reflect the expectation factor. KEY TAKEAWAY: We assess that the marketing sales prospect will depend more on improving consumer purchasing power than on lower interest rates. This is because mortgage interest rates have been at relatively low levels and tend to be sticky. For illustration, the average interest rate from commercial banks for mortgages only dropped from 6.91% in December 2024 to 6.84% in June 2025, even though the BI Rate has fallen -125 bps since the beginning of the year. On the other hand, based on historical movements as seen in the chart above, the general trend of declining interest rates has the potential to provide a positive sentiment for the stock price movements of property issuers.

marketNews.title: Other Hot News
marketNews.content: President Prabowo Subianto on Monday (10/20) said that Indonesia will domestically produce a national car within the next 3 years. President Prabowo mentioned that the government has allocated funds and prepared land for the factory that will be the production base for this national car. Minister of ESDM, Bahlil Lahadalia, stated that his side is still assessing the schedule for the start of the mandatory 10% bioethanol mixture in gasoline or E10, adding that this policy will likely begin no later than 2027. Bahlil explained that the government will ensure that the construction of domestic ethanol plants can support the supply needs for the bioethanol mixture. The source of bioethanol raw material comes from cassava and sugarcane, which is expected to create new employment opportunities for farmers. The government will impose import duty for safeguard measures (BMTP or safeguard duties) on cotton yarn imports for 3 years starting October 30, 2025, based on Minister of Finance Regulation No. 67/2025. The BMTP tariff will start at IDR 7,500 per kg in the first year and will gradually decrease to IDR 7,277 per kg in the third year. This policy aims to protect the domestic textile industry from import surges that could potentially disrupt the competitiveness of local producers. Bisnis reported that the management of Perintis Triniti Properti ($TRIN) in a public exposition on Tuesday (10/21) stated they were in intensive discussion stages with potential strategic partners to strengthen their business structure and capital. However, TRIN management did not elaborate further.

marketNews.title: Gold ATH Amidst ATH: What Is Actually Happening?
marketNews.content: "In other words, the record-breaking gold price surge is not the result of momentum trading, but rather a reflection of structural global changes." - VarelJoanK

tickerNews.title: Telkom Indonesia Spins Off Part of Wholesale Fiber Connectivity Business
tickerNews.content: $TLKM: Telkom Indonesia signed an agreement with its subsidiary, PT Telkom Infrastruktur Indonesia (TIF), to spin off part of its wholesale fiber connectivity business and assets to TIF. This transaction, valued at ~IDR 35.8 trillion, will help the company increase business focus and optimize the utilization of fiber optic network assets, according to TLKM's statement.

tickerNews.title: Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal's Net Profit in 3Q25 and 9M25 Increases
tickerNews.content: $IPCC: Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal recorded a net profit of IDR 76 billion in 3Q25 (+14% YoY, +22% QoQ). This result brought the net profit for 9M25 to IDR 190 billion (+29% YoY). The annual net profit increase in 3Q25 and 9M25 was driven by: 1) revenue growth; and 2) increased interest income. Revenue increased by +9%/+13% YoY in 3Q25/9M25, while financial income surged by +36%/+42% YoY.

tickerNews.title: WIFI Announces 9M25 Home Pass and Home Connect Progress
tickerNews.content: $WIFI: Shannedy Ong, Director of Solusi Sinergi Digital, stated that WIFI has built 1.5 million home passes and 830,000 home connects until 9M25, with a take-up rate of 55%. Shannedy explained that compared to the realization as of December 2024, the growth in home passes during 9M25 reached 11.3x, while the growth in home connects reached 8.2x. WIFI itself targets to build 2.5 million home passes and 1.5 million home connects by the end of 2025.

tickerNews.title: PTPP, ADHI Merger Targeted for Realization in 2026
tickerNews.content: $PTPP: Kontan reported that the merger of PT PP and Adhi Karya ($ADHI) will be implemented in 2H26, with PTPP as the resulting entity. Danantara COO, Dony Oskaria, has not commented on this issue. Meanwhile, PTPP Corporate Secretary, Joko Raharjo, stated that the PTPP and ADHI merger process is targeted for realization in 2026.

tickerNews.title: Apexindo Pratama Duta Secures Seven-Month Offshore Drilling Contract Worth $13.6 Million
tickerNews.content: $APEX: Apexindo Pratama Duta obtained a seven-month offshore drilling contract from PT Pertamina Hulu Mahakam with an estimated value of US$13.6 million or approximately IDR 225 billion.

tickerNews.title: Darma Henwa Shareholder Sells DEWA Shares, Ownership Drops to 5.81%
tickerNews.content: $DEWA: Darma Henwa shareholder, PT Madhani Talatah Nusantara, sold 105 million DEWA shares on October 13, 2025, at an average price of 75 rupiah per share. The total transaction value reached approximately IDR 7.9 billion. After this transaction, PT Madhani Talatah Nusantara's direct ownership stake in DEWA decreased from 6.07% to 5.81%.

tickerNews.title: Jaya Sukses Makmur Sentosa Plans Rights Issue, Discussed in GMS on November 27, 2025
tickerNews.content: $RISE: Jaya Sukses Makmur Sentosa plans to hold a rights issue of up to 1.3 billion new shares, with the execution price and ratio yet to be announced. The proceeds from this corporate action are intended for strategic land development, working capital, and/or the settlement of part or all of the company's bank loans. This plan will be discussed in an Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (RUPSLB) on November 27, 2025.

tickerNews.title: Multi Medika Internasional Plans Bonus Share Distribution Ratio 1:1
tickerNews.content: $MMIX: Multi Medika Internasional ($MMIX) plans to distribute bonus shares at a 1:1 ratio from share premium amounting to IDR 60 billion. The cum date for regular and negotiation markets is October 23, 2025, with the bonus share distribution on November 10, 2025.

tickerNews.title: Tirta Mahakam Resources Secures Sea Transport Business License and Signs Ship Lease Agreements
tickerNews.content: $TIRT: Tirta Mahakam Resources ($TIRT) announced that it has obtained a sea transportation company business license (SIUPAL) from the Ministry of Transportation. TIRT also announced that it has signed ship lease agreements, with details as follows: 1) leasing a vessel to PT Guna Harapan Lestari worth IDR 250 million per month; and 2) leasing a vessel to an affiliated party, PT Lima Srikandi Jaya, worth IDR 5.25 billion per month. TIRT explained that in the sea transportation business, the company's activities are carried out through two types of contracts, namely freight charter and time charter. Currently, the company is in the process of obtaining a mining services business license (IUJP), which will allow the company to carry out the transportation of mining commodities under a freight charter scheme.
